mapper.select: SELECT M_TITLE, COUNT(M_TITLE)*10000 SALES FROM RESERVEDSEAT JOIN SCREENING ON RESERVEDSEAT.SCR_PK_NO = SCREENING.SCR_PK JOIN MOVIE ON MOVIE.MOVIE_PK = SCREENING.MOVIE_PK_NO JOIN RESERVATION ON RESERVATION.RESERVATION_PK = RESERVEDSEAT.RESERVATION_PK_NO WHERE PAYMENT = 1 GROUP BY M_TITLE

SELECT COUNT(*)*10000 TOTALSALES FROM RESERVEDSEAT JOIN SCREENING ON RESERVEDSEAT.SCR_PK_NO = SCREENING.SCR_PK JOIN MOVIE ON MOVIE.MOVIE_PK = SCREENING.MOVIE_PK_NO JOIN RESERVATION ON RESERVATION.RESERVATION_PK = RESERVEDSEAT.RESERVATION_PK_NO WHERE PAYMENT = 1 GROUP BY PAYMENT

SELECT M_TITLE, USERID, KAKAOUSERID, R.RESERVE_DATE, COUNT(*)*10000 sales FROM RESERVEDSEAT RS INNER JOIN SCREENING S ON RS.SCR_PK_NO = S.SCR_PK INNER JOIN MOVIE M ON M.MOVIE_PK = S.MOVIE_PK_NO INNER JOIN RESERVATION R ON R.RESERVATION_PK = RS.RESERVATION_PK_NO WHERE PAYMENT = 1 GROUP BY R.RESERVE_DATE, M_TITLE, USERID, KAKAOUSERID ORDER BY RESERVE_DATE DESC
